faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question_1: How do I search for properties?
faq.answer_1: Use our advanced search filters to find properties by location, type, price range, and more. You can also save your searches for future reference.
faq.answer_2: Yes! You can schedule viewings directly through our platform or contact our agents for personalized assistance.
faq.answer_3: We work with trusted financial partners to help you secure the best financing options for your property purchase.
faq.question_4: How do I list my property for sale?
faq.answer_4: Contact our team or use our 'Sell Your Property' service to get a free valuation and listing consultation.

hero.title: About Nawy Real Estate
hero.subtitle: Egypt's Leading Real Estate Platform
hero.description: We're revolutionizing the real estate experience in Egypt by connecting buyers, sellers, and agents through innovative technology and exceptional service.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To make property transactions transparent, efficient, and accessible for everyone in Egypt.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To become the most trusted real estate platform in the Middle East and North Africa region.

values.title: Our Values
values.text: Integrity, innovation, and customer-centricity drive everything we do.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph_1: Founded in 2017, Nawy began with a simple mission: to transform Egypt's real estate market through technology and transparency.
story.paragraph_2: Starting as a small team of real estate enthusiasts, we've grown to become Egypt's leading property platform, serving thousands of customers across the country.
story.paragraph_3: Today, we continue to innovate and expand, always keeping our customers' needs at the heart of everything we do.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The experts behind your real estate journey
team.ceo_bio: Ahmed brings over 15 years of real estate and technology experience to lead Nawy's vision.
team.cto_bio: Sarah leads our technical innovation, ensuring our platform remains cutting-edge and user-friendly.
team.head_sales_bio: Omar oversees our sales operations and agent network across Egypt.

why_choose.title: Why Choose Nawy?
why_choose.subtitle: We're committed to excellence in real estate
why_choose.expertise_text: Deep knowledge of Egypt's real estate market and trends.
why_choose.trust_text: Verified listings and transparent pricing for your peace of mind.
why_choose.support_text: Our dedicated team is always ready to assist you.
why_choose.innovation_text: Advanced search tools and seamless user experience.

cta.title: Ready to Find Your Dream Home?
cta.text: Join thousands of satisfied customers who found their perfect property with Nawy.

blog.no_articles_text: Check back soon for the latest real estate insights and news.
